remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution, deduction form.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
sbcied.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
sbcied.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
sbciedf.3 $e |- F/ x ph $.
sbciedf.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
sbciedf $p |- ( ph -> ( [. A / x ]. ps <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
